english.segment1: Sometimes I feel like I'm falling, sometimes I feel higher than the stars
english.segment2: Sometimes I can hear You calling, sometimes I feel lost.
english.segment3: But then I lift my eyes up, I see where I belong
english.segment4: Sometimes I feel weighed down by this treasure, when I think of all You've done just. for me
english.segment5: Sometimes there's so much to discover, sometimes I see the cost
english.segment6: But when I lift my eyes up, I see where I belong
english.segment7: Life is just a journey home, then I will be with You
english.segment8: Life is just a journey home, when I will rest with You
english.segment9: Life is just a way back home
english.segment11: Oh, what a perfect day it'll be
